kw.name: Get Payload To Add Book Details
Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: POST
kw.msg: POST Request : url=https://rahulshettyacademy.com/Library/Addbook.php path_url=/Library/Addbook.php headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.31.0', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Length': '81', 'Content-Type': 'application/json'} body=b'{"name": "Robotframework", "isbn": "ADCC09", "aisle": "456", "author": "Ranjith"}'
kw.doc: Sends a POST request.

kw.name: Log
kw.arg: Post response Message: ${response.json()}[Msg] for the ID ${response.json()}[ID]
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Log
kw.msg: Post response Message: Successfully added the record with the message: successfully added and the ID: ADCC09456

kw.name: Set Global Variable
